menu.menu_id as menu_id, menu.title as menu_title, menu.permission as menu_permission
dept.dept_id as dept_id, dept.name as dept_name

where.if: and ( role.name like concat('%', #{criteria.blurry}, '%') or role.description like concat('%', #{criteria.blurry}, '%') )

mapper.select: select role_id as id, name, level from sys_role order by level
